"...Aah?!": "I can see you're still good at masking your presence."
"She's become an instructor for ARKS recruits, I hear."
"She should be... fine on her own, I'm sure."
"I'd be lying if I said I wasn't..."
"...She's quite quick at adapting to whatever situation she's in, so she should definitely be fine."
"I'll have to step up my efforts as well."
"When I was in Leciel, I felt as if I knew pretty much everything there is to know about Halpha..."
"But now, it feels as if I have more questions than answers..."
"Halpha's ecosystem, for example, is maintained without any direct intervention from Leciel."
"Stuff like that is all completely automated, so not even we know how it works."
"...This includes the production of DOLLS on Halpha..."
"So destroying the Plants is our only option..."
"That should really be a last resort..."
"First, I want to fully examine how energy is provided to every region."
"After that, I'll do another review of the DOLLS manufacturing process."
"Indeed, and I'll see that it's found..."
"I want you to look out for Aina, okay?"
